name: The Rooms
description:
You wake up in an empty room. You think, maybe you should go through the door in front of you. You keep going through, but it's all the same. Doors in front of you, a new room after that. Can you escape? (you can't)

NOTE: YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD PYTHON FIRST TO BE ABLE TO PLAY THIS GAME: https://www.python.org/downloads/ (python is automatically installed for mac and linux. If still does not work, download python 3 using the link.) 

Discord (To see more of my projects): https://discord.gg/db2xN9m
